title: 4 Skin Benefits of Green Tea
description: Green tea can help with acne, sun protection and even reverse signs of aging.
cleaned_text: Green tea is an anti-inflammatory and contains caffeine. This means when applied topically it can help with numerous skin concerns, per [ MBG Lifestyle.](https://www.mindbodygreen.com/articles/green-tea-benefits-for-skin) 1. Clear Skin Green tea can help control sebum production and fight acne-causing bacteria. It can even help heal current acne and diminish scarring. 2. Protect From The Sun Not only can it [protect against UV damage](https://www.skininc.com/skinscience/ingredients/32301389.html), but green tea can even help repair or [slow signs of aging ](https://www.skininc.com/skinscience/ingredients/104782229.html)such as sun spots, fine lines and wrinkles due to the polyphenols it contains. 3. Soothe Green tea can help with conditions such as rosacea and atopic eczema as it works to reduce inflammatory skin. 4. Reduces Puffiness With 28 mg of caffeine, green tea can help reduce puffiness and inflammation of the skin.
